document.full_text: the only thing certain about the 137th running of the kentucky derby is that 20 horses are going to show up at churchill downs on the first saturday in may.
document.title: on horse racing: as favorites fall, others are waiting to fill their shoes
lines_and_colors: the only thing certain about the 137th running of the kentucky derby is that 20 horses are going to show up at churchill downs on the first saturday in may.
